europeana:record.dc:title: Historical biogeography of Fungia (Pleuractis) spp. (Scleractinia: Fungiidae), including a new species from the Seychelles
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Hoeksema B.W.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Scleractinia; Fungiidae; Fungia; Pleuractis; mushroom corals; new species; phylogeny; biogeography; Seychelles
europeana:record.dc:description: An update of the phylogeny and biogeography of mushroom coral species belonging to Fungia (Pleuractis) is presented. Among the five species of this monophyletic group, one is described as new to science. This species, Fungia seychellensis spec, nov., was discovered during the Netherlands Seychelles Expedition (1992-1993) in the framework of the Netherlands Indian Ocean Programme 1990/1995.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Historical biogeography of Fungia (Pleuractis) spp. (Scleractinia: Fungiidae), including a new species from the Seychelles (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 67) (Issue 43)
